content: Poisestone fights like all of the other enemies of her type in Black Myth: Wukong. Her main methods of attack are kick-based, and they hit extremely hard. Thankfully, most of her attacks can be avoided with well-timed Perfect Dodges. Be careful when you knock Poisestone down that she is actually dead. Some rock enemies have a habit of passing out for a bit before getting back up to continue fighting.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Poisestone_Spirit.md", within the section "Poisestone Spirit" and the sub-section "Poisestone Fight". The content is presented below:

Poisestone fights like all of the other enemies of her type in Black Myth: Wukong. Her main methods of attack are kick-based, and they hit extremely hard. Thankfully, most of her attacks can be avoided with well-timed Perfect Dodges. Be careful when you knock Poisestone down that she is actually dead. Some rock enemies have a habit of passing out for a bit before getting back up to continue fighting.
